label: cascading_failure_01_ep_020
content:
## 2024-02-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: 150100 req | p50: 190ms p95: 510ms p99: 940ms | err: 2.47% (3700 errors) | success: 97.53%
- /fraud_check: 149600 req | p50: 145ms p95: 390ms p99: 680ms | err: 0.55% (820 errors) | success: 99.45%
- /geo_lookup: 147000 req | p50: 270ms p95: 560ms p99: 710ms | err: 0.27% (390 errors) | success: 99.73%
- /auth: 195300 req | p50: 44ms p95: 112ms p99: 205ms | err: 0.13% (250 errors) | success: 99.87%
- /product_catalog: 262900 req | p50: 55ms p95: 165ms p99: 300ms | err: 0.12% (320 errors) | success: 99.88%
- /search: 227900 req | p50: 75ms p95: 202ms p99: 355ms | err: 0.18% (410 errors) | success: 99.82%
- /recommendations: 184700 req | p50: 94ms p95: 265ms p99: 450ms | err: 0.22% (400 errors) | success: 99.78%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 70% | Mem 78% | Disk 63% | Conns: 4950 | Net: 670/805 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 67% | Mem 76% | Disk 62% | Conns: 4785 | Net: 650/785 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 75% | Mem 77% | Disk 60% | Conns: 4520 | Net: 590/700 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 45% | Mem 78% | Disk 86% | Conns: 360 | Net: 172/205 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 200 | idle 0 | waiting 190 | exhaustion: 14 | max: 200 | avg_wait: 170ms
- replica: active 100 | idle 0 | waiting 38 | exhaustion: 5 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 40ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 110 | exhaustion: 15 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 200ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92.1% | Bandwidth: 8.9 Gbps | Origin requests: 456700

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=primary events=14 waiting=190
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-02: geo_lookup_p99_ms=710

### Deployments & Changes
- Deployed service-B (fraud) v2.7.6

### Events
- Service-B deploy completed
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Adjusted gateway circuit breaker to open after 30 geo failures in 60s
- Added dashboard panel for third_party_geo pool waiting

### On-Call
- shift handoff: A. Chen. 12 pages. 4 tickets (SRV-B-258, GW-352, POOL-580, CO-821). Status: Mitigating.
